tensordb.storages.ZarrStorage.append¶

ZarrStorage.append(new_data: Union[xarray.core.dataarray.DataArray, xarray.core.dataset.Dataset], compute: bool = True) → List[xarray.backends.zarr.ZarrStore]¶

Append data at the end of a Zarr file (in case that the file does not exist it will call the store method), internally it calls the to_zarr method for every dimension of your data.

Parameters
new_data: Union[xr.DataArray, xr.Dataset]

This is the data that want to be appended at the end

compute: bool, default True

Same meaning that in xarray

Returns
A list of xr.backends.ZarrStore produced by the to_zarr method executed in every dimension

previous

tensordb.storages.ZarrStorage.store

next

tensordb.storages.ZarrStorage.update
